stimulusHtml: At what times in the interval 0<t<18, if any, does the squirrel change direction? Give a reason for your answer.

features.html: A squirrel starts at building A at time t=0 and travels along a straight,horizontal wire connected to building B. For 0≤t≤18 , the squirrel's velocity is modeled by the piecewise-linear function defined by the graph above.
